pages.text: Majestic. Elegant. Cluck. The Chorse is the pinnacle of mounts; half chicken, half horse, perfect combo of both. Chorses come in a wide variety of colors and costumes. Find strange eggs or breed them with chicken breeding items to find your favorite color! See the following pages for care instructions. $(br2)How to Obtain:$(li)Item: Strange Egg$(li)Breeding

pages.title: Strange Egg
pages.text: How strange.... This egg is simply a Chorse spawn egg. Can be used in all the ways spawn eggs can normally be used. Find this oddity in witch houses.

pages.title: Breeding
pages.text: Chorses can be bred with standard Chicken Food. They follow all the standard breeding mechanics of vanilla mobs. Baby chorses (choals?) are born with a completely random variant, and Chorses always have the same stats.

pages.title: Stunting
pages.text: Baby chorses are cute lil' fellers ain't they? If you want to keep your chorse baby forever, feed it $(item)Fermented Spider Eye$() to stunt it. A stunted baby will never grow up. If you decide you do want the adult chorse after all, feed the baby a $(item)Golden Carrot$() to un-stunt it.

pages.title: Drops
pages.text: Adult chorses eat a lot. A. Lot. That also means they poop a lot. Chorses will periodically leave behind some $(item)Chorse Chit$(). Gather up these fertile droppings and use them just like bone meal!$(br2)Adult chorses will also drop the following on death:$(li)Raw Chicken (cooked if on fire)$(li)Feather$(li)Chorse Chit
